title: Removing the Add-ons Manager tab
content: When I open my Firefox browser 'Add-ons Manager' automatically shows up as a tab. How can I stop that tab from opening?
creator: ray032

title: Can't update to newest version of Firefox: ESR  although using macOs Catalina 10.15.7
content:
Hi,

First, I went to Firefox > About and it updated to: version 115, so then I downloaded Firefox extended support release [ESR] for mac from this site; while downloading; closed Firefox browser; and once finished downloading, I dragged to the 'applications folder.' Once there I clicked, "open" and it's still showing latest version: 115.

In Settings > Add-ons > Manage extensions, I have the following:

Adblock + Brave is disabled

DuckDuckGo is enabled

  • I do not have Firefox showing at all.

Please advise what to do next.

Thanks
creator: leoniewithane

title: Extensões desativando sozinhas.
content:
Minhas extensões estão desativando sozinhos. Já fiz de tudo, já entrei no modo de segurança, já desativei uma por uma, já desinstalei elas e instalei novamente, já restaurei o Firefox, já reinstalei o Firefox e até agora nada. Já tô quase mudando de navegador pela primeira vez em minha vida. Eu costumo usar o AdGuard, o Tradutor e o enhanced-h264ify. Agora estou usando apenas o uBlock. Isso tudo já fazem uns 6 meses ou mais.

My extensions are deactivating themselves. I've done everything, I've entered safe mode, I've deactivated them one by one, I've uninstalled them and reinstalled them, I've restored Firefox, I've reinstalled Firefox and so far nothing. I'm almost changing browsers for the first time in my life. I usually use AdGuard, Translator and enhanced-h264ify. Now I'm only using uBlock. This has been going on for about 6 months or more.
creator: dougpraet

title: problemi del player di youtube
content: da qualche giorno youtube non visualizza piu correttamente il payer di youtube...devo ingrandirlo più del normale per vedere correttamente sottotitoli full screen etc.... il play e volume invece rimangono invariati la prima immagine mostra zoom a 150 per visualizzare correttamente il player la seconda il player al 100%
creator: gyozariot
